### emitLabel() {#ad765ad35ceb5fb06da044f0f4d365a3b}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>void PPCELFStreamer::emitLabel (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcsymbol">MCSymbol</a> &#42; Symbol, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smloc">SMLoc</a> Loc=<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smloc">SMLoc</a>())</>}
  labels = {["virtual"]}>
Emit a label for <code>Symbol</code> into the current section.

This corresponds to an assembler statement such as: foo:


<ParametersList title="Parameters">
<ParametersListItem name="Symbol">- The symbol to emit. A given symbol should only be emitted as a label once, and symbols emitted as a label should never be used in an assignment.</ParametersListItem>
</ParametersList>
